Class Saving

java.lang.Object
Account
Saving
public class Saving extends Account
The Saving class represents a savings account that extends the Account class. It contains information about the savings account number and the starting balance of the savings account.
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Juan Moreno, Javier Ontiveros
